<<<<<<< HEAD
A Looking-glass for good women to dress themselves by: held forth in the life & death of Mrs. Katherine Clarke, who dyed, Anno Christi, 1675. Late wife of Mr. Samuel Clarke, minister. Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.
88, [8] p.
Printed for William Miller, at the Gilded Acorn in St. Paul's Church-yard, over against the little north door., London, : 1677.
Attributed to Samuel Clarke by Wing. Includes publisher's catalog ([8] p. at end). Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
